title: Bert's Alfredo Chicken
directions: In a Dutch oven, heat 1Tbsp oil and add chicken. Season with salt and pepper, add 4 cloves garlic, and brown the chicken. Add 2½ cups broth, 2½ cups cream, 1 lb pasta, and bring to a boil. Cover and reduce the heat to a simmer for 15-20 minutes.

Turn off heat and stir in 1½ cups Parmesan cheese. Pour half the pasta into a greased 11x7 or 9x13 inch baking dish. Sprinkle evenly with 1 cup of mozzarella cheese. Layer the remaining half of the pasta evenly on top. Sprinkle evenly with 1 cup mozzarella and ½ cup Parmesan.
Broil 10-15 minutes on low, or until cheese is golden brown. Remove and sprinkle with fresh parsley. Serves 6-8.
